name: Murder Spree at the BWT
description:
WASD for movement, left click for attack, right click for roll,

On controller left stick for movement, west button for attack, east button for roll

For explanation on theme the game takes place in the BWT (Bureau of Worldly Transitions) you get reincarnated as a demon but get stuck in the office on the way, slay your way through the office to reach a better world (literally)

The game is kinda sh*t by the way, linux and mac might work but I doubt it

Thank you to SDR Shadow for Art and music
I did coding, unity stuff, and SFX

For the 2023_1 Brackeys Game Jam
